title: Index of Consumption of Raw Cotton for Great Britain
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1920-1936 (2)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1924-1939, Data Based On"Total Deliveries Of Cotton As Published By The Liverpool Cotton Association Converted Into Pounds, Placed On A Daily Basis And Corrected For Seasonal Fluctuations". Source: The Economist, Supplement Of July 25, 1936, P.5; And Following Issues.

This NBER data series m01197b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01197b
